meanings.definition: A gathering or event where songs are performed.
meanings.sent1: The school organized a songfests for the students to showcase their singing talents.
meanings.sent2: The annual music concert turned into a lively songfests with various performances.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the karaoke machine turned the gathering into a fun songfests.
meanings.sent4: The city park transformed into a magical songfests as musicians played under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The beach party became a memorable songfests with everyone singing along to their favorite tunes.

meanings.definition: A competition or festival featuring musical performances.
meanings.sent1: Local bands competed in the songfests to win the title of best musical group.
meanings.sent2: The town's annual songfests attracted musicians from all over the country.
meanings.sent3: The songfests became intense as each singer tried to outperform the others.
meanings.sent4: The songfests was a battlefield of melodies where only the most talented could shine.
meanings.sent5: The songfests was a vibrant celebration of music, bringing joy to all who attended.
